cutter.math

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • cutter.math.Random

  • public class Random
extends java.lang.Object
    The Random-class contains methods for creating random numbers, strings and booleans. This method has no support for calculation methods!
    Author:
    Phil Niehus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Random() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Boolean randomBool()
      This method generates a random Boolean
      static double randomDouble()
      This method returns a random Double between 0 and Double.MAX_VALUE
      static double randomDouble(double minValue, double maxValue)
      This method calculates a random Double between minValue and maxValue
      static int randomInt()
      This method returns a random Integer between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE
      static int randomInt(int minValue, int maxValue)
      This method calculates a random integer between minValue and maxValue
      static java.lang.String randomString(int length)
      This method generates a random String with the selected length, using only ASCII-characters

        public static int randomInt()
        This method returns a random Integer between 1 and Integer.MAX_VALUE

        A random integer

      • randomInt

        public static int randomInt(int minValue,
                            int maxValue)
        This method calculates a random integer between minValue and maxValue
        Parameters:
        minValue - The minimum value for the generated Integer
        maxValue - The maximum value for the generated Integer
        Returns:
        A random Integer between minValue and maxValue

      • randomDouble

        public static double randomDouble()
        This method returns a random Double between 0 and Double.MAX_VALUE
        Returns:
        A random integer

      • randomDouble

        public static double randomDouble(double minValue,
                                  double maxValue)
        This method calculates a random Double between minValue and maxValue
        Parameters:
        minValue - The minimum value for the generated Double
        maxValue - The maximum value for the generated Double
        Returns:
        A random Double between minValue and maxValue

      • randomBool

        public static java.lang.Boolean randomBool()
        This method generates a random Boolean
        Returns:

      • randomString

        public static java.lang.String randomString(int length)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method generates a random String with the selected length, using only ASCII-characters
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the random String between 0 and Integer.MAX_VALUE
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the given length is smaller than 1
